resources.string: This activity shows a list of songs. Click on a song to move to now playing or click on GRID VIEW to switch to grid view. The MediaPlayer class could be used to fetch songs from local resources or external URLs.

This activity shows a grid of songs. Click on a song to move to now playing or click on LIST VIEW to switch to list view. The MediaPlayer class could be used to fetch songs from local resources or external URLs.
This is the "Now Playing" activity. Press the device "back" button to return to the songs. Here the MediaPlayer class could be used to implement controlling playback of the songs.
